ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello and A Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Robert, I used to play on Mith Marr, had a level 30 druid there.  I m on Brell Serelis now though. As far as I know, if you are meditating, your mana comes
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Robert,

I used to play on Mith Marr, had a level 30 druid there. I'm on Brell
Serelis now though.

As far as I know, if you are meditating, your mana comes back at a
constant rate. Maybe it just seems to raise faster some times? Also the
enchanter spell 'clarity' increases mana regeneration.

- Tina

On Wed, 15 Mar 2000, Robert Coons wrote:

> From: Robert Coons <robert.coons@...>
>
> Hiya !
>
> I'm new to the list and wanted to say Hiya !
>
> I've got a pretty simple question - Sometimes when I'm meditating my mana
> bar raises pretty quickly and sometimes very very slow. What causes this ?
> Is there something that I can raise or do to make this faster. My skill
> level is around 100 in mediate - by the way...
>
> Anyone else on Mith Marr besides me ?????
>
> Thankies !
>
> Klek (Shaman Troll level 19 - Mith Marr)
>
>
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
